The '''Virtuous Share Bundle''' is available as part of the [[Adventurer's Instructional Bundle]], which can be purchased in the [[Gift Shop]] section in the Shop at limited times.

One of the following can be selected upon using this item:
{{Card List|delim=;|show_caption=1|
Guide to Freedom*1;
Guide to Resistance*1;
Guide to Ballad*1;
Guide to Prosperity*1;
Guide to Diligence*1;
Guide to Gold*1;
Guide to Transience*1;
Guide to Elegance*1;
Guide to Light*1;
Guide to Admonition*1;
Guide to Ingenuity*1;
Guide to Praxis*1;
Guide to Equity*1;
Guide to Justice*1;
Guide to Order*1;
Guide to Contention*1;
Guide to Kindling*1;
Guide to Conflict*1}}
